eas_text: A civil authority has issued A HAZARDOUS MATERIALS WARNING for the following counties or areas: Rensselaer, NY; at 11:37 AM ON JAN 7, 2026 Effective until 11:37 AM JAN 8, 2026. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: UPDATE: Those evacuated may return home EXCEPT those who reside on Cook Brook Rd.
